Room.Name: Gardener's Shack
Room.ShortDescription: You are inside a small shack used by the gardener.
Room.LongDescription: Unfortunately, there's no gardener here right now. He's probably out in the garden cleaning up. The shack apperently has nothing fancy in it besides some hoes and shovels which could be used as weapons if you got desperate. The gardener won't like you taking his supplies from him, though.
